Posts.Content: donnamariem wrote: Is it possible to have a new cancer during radiation?  I am only on my 6th treatment, but I found a lump last night.  Should I be concerned? Dx 5/13/2009, IDC, <1cm, Stage I, Grade 1, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Aug 4, 2009 10:44AM donnamariem wrote: Elimar -  I'm in the same boat.  Still up in the air about Tamoxifen.  Of course it's the side effects that have me in doubt.  And for 5 years!  I was also thinking of a trial run just to see how it goes.  How long do you think you would give it?  Three months, six months??  I just don't think that the side effects outweigh the benefit, because I can't get it out of my mind that there is just no guarantee.
